Description

Defines the core behavior of special abilities and provides a base for derived classes.

Represents a brick.

A ResourceProvider used to retrieve resources from a ResourceBundle.
CenteredStringDrawingContext
A StringDrawingContext used to draw centered strings.
Direction
Specifies the direction of a one-dimensional vector.

Defines methods for drawing entities.

Defines an entity.

Represents an application used to play table tennis.

Defines a game context.

Defines the core behavior of a game engine and provides a base for derived classes.

Defines methods for bouncing entities.

Represents the initial menu game state.

Represents the Instruction game state.

Represents the ability to change the length of the paddle.

Represents a table tennis paddle.

Defines the core behavior of resource providers and provides a base for derived classes.

Represents the Singleplayer game state.
SpeedAbility
Represents the ability to change the speed of the ball.

Represents a table used for table tennis.
